me.taylorkelly.mywarp.platform

Interface Platform


  • public interface Platform
    A platform MyWarp has been adapted to run on.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RelationalDataService createDataService(ConnectionConfiguration configuration)
      Creates a RelationalDataService as described by the given config.
      <C> com.google.common.base.Optional<C> getCapability(java.lang.Class<C> capabilityClass)
      Gets an Optional with the instance of the given class or Optional.absent() if this Platform is unable to provide support.
      java.io.File getDataFolder()
      Gets the data-folder when running in this Platform.
      Game getGame()
      Gets the Game as implemented by this Platform.
      ProfileCache getProfileCache()
      Gets the ProfileCache as implemented by this Platform.
      Settings getSettings()
      Gets the Settings as implemented by this Platform.
      void onCoreReload()
      Called when MyWarp is reloaded.
      void onWarpsLoaded()
      Called when the core has successfully loaded warps from the storage system and populated the active WarpManager.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataFolder

        java.io.File getDataFolder()
        Gets the data-folder when running in this Platform. The folder is expected to exist and be read- and writable for MyWarp.
        Returns:
        the data-folder

      • getGame

        Game getGame()
        Gets the Game as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the Game

      • getSettings

        Settings getSettings()
        Gets the Settings as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the Settings

      • getProfileCache

        ProfileCache getProfileCache()
        Gets the ProfileCache as implemented by this Platform.
        Returns:
        the ProfileCache

      • getCapability

        <C> com.google.common.base.Optional<C> getCapability(java.lang.Class<C> capabilityClass)
        Gets an Optional with the instance of the given class or Optional.absent() if this Platform is unable to provide support.

        None of the capabilities requested by calling this method are required for MyWarp to run. The following capabilities can be expected and should - if possible - be covered:

        • EconomyCapability
        • LimitCapability
        • TimerCapability

        Type Parameters:
        C - the type of the capability
        Parameters:
        capabilityClass - the class of the requested capability
        Returns:
        an Optional with an instance of the requested capability

      • createDataService

        RelationalDataService createDataService(ConnectionConfiguration configuration)
        Creates a RelationalDataService as described by the given config.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration
        Returns:
        the RelationalDataService

      • onCoreReload

        void onCoreReload()
        Called when MyWarp is reloaded. By this state, Warps are no longer available; any services that depend on configuration should be reconstructed.

        Unless errors occur, calls to this method are followed by a call to onWarpsLoaded() shortly after.

      • onWarpsLoaded

        void onWarpsLoaded()
        Called when the core has successfully loaded warps from the storage system and populated the active WarpManager. By this state, all initialization should be complete.
